description: Create an Elastic Container Service (ECS) cluster.

CapacityProviderStrategyItem.description: A capacity provider strategy consists of one or more capacity providers along with the `base` and `weight` to assign to them. A capacity provider must be associated with the cluster to be used in a capacity provider strategy. The PutClusterCapacityProviders API is used to associate a capacity provider with a cluster. Only capacity providers with an `ACTIVE` or `UPDATING` status can be used.

CapacityProvider.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Weight.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Base.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderStrategyItem.markdownDescription:
A capacity provider strategy consists of one or more capacity providers along with the `base` and `weight` to assign to them. A capacity provider must be associated with the cluster to be used in a capacity provider strategy. The PutClusterCapacityProviders API is used to associate a capacity provider with a cluster. Only capacity providers with an `ACTIVE` or `UPDATING` status can be used.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ClusterSettings.description: The setting to use when creating a cluster. This parameter is used to enable CloudWatch Container Insights for a cluster. If this value is specified, it will override the containerInsights value set with PutAccountSetting or PutAccountSettingDefault.
